claim_text: Price inflation is “soaring” at a two year high of 1%.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: It’s correct that consumer price inflation is at a two year high. But that’s far from a “soaring” rate of inflation.

review_rating.alternateName: It’s correct that consumer price inflation is at a two year high. But that’s far from a “soaring” rate of inflation.

claim_text: The UK delivers 69% of the EU’s world trade surplus.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is correct for trade in goods but does not include trade in services. It’s also a figure which could be misleading unless you understand exactly how it’s calculated.

review_rating.alternateName: This is correct for trade in goods but does not include trade in services. It’s also a figure which could be misleading unless you understand exactly how it’s calculated.

claim_text: There is a specific criminal offence of assaulting a police, immigration, or prison officer, but not of assaulting a doctor, nurse, or paramedic.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct, but the maximum sentence for assaulting a police officer is no higher than that for assaulting anyone else, and sentencing rules say that assaults on public sector workers of all kinds should be treated especially seriously.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct, but the maximum sentence for assaulting a police officer is no higher than that for assaulting anyone else, and sentencing rules say that assaults on public sector workers of all kinds should be treated especially seriously.

claim_text: Boris Johnson wrote that working class men are “likely to be drunk, criminal, aimless, feckless and hopeless” in The Spectator in 1995.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. He specifically said “blue collar” men.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. He specifically said “blue collar” men.

claim_text: The national debt almost tripled under the last Labour government.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct in cash terms, but after adjusting for inflation it’s more like doubled than tripled. Public sector net debt, adjusted for inflation, rose by 125% between 1996/97 and 2009/10 – mostly after the recession that began in 2008.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct in cash terms, but after adjusting for inflation it’s more like doubled than tripled. Public sector net debt, adjusted for inflation, rose by 125% between 1996/97 and 2009/10 – mostly after the recession that began in 2008.

claim_text: Staying at least 1m away from people cuts your risk of catching Covid-19 by 80%.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is correct, based on new research in the Lancet.

review_rating.alternateName: This is correct, based on new research in the Lancet.

claim_text: Cutting the distance between people from 2m to 1m might double their risk of catching Covid-19.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is correct, based on new research in the Lancet.

review_rating.alternateName: This is correct, based on new research in the Lancet.

claim_text: The UK has the lowest unemployment since 1975.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. It was at 4.3% between May and July 2017.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. It was at 4.3% between May and July 2017.

claim_text: Both female Prime Ministers have been Conservatives.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. The UK has had two female Prime Ministers, both Conservative MPs.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. The UK has had two female Prime Ministers, both Conservative MPs.

claim_text: Half of the shadow cabinet members are women.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct then and now. 16 out of 32 members of the current Labour shadow cabinet are women.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct then and now. 16 out of 32 members of the current Labour shadow cabinet are women.

claim_text: The Labour party has more women MPs than all the other parties in the House of Commons combined.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct then and now. Following the 2017 election, 119 out of the 208 women MPs are Labour Party members.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct then and now. Following the 2017 election, 119 out of the 208 women MPs are Labour Party members.

claim_text: Health tourism costs nearly £300 million on some estimates.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct.

claim_text: Recovering the costs of health tourism won’t plug the funding gap the NHS is facing.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. These costs are relatively small compared to the amounts the NHS will need to find to maintain current services.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. These costs are relatively small compared to the amounts the NHS will need to find to maintain current services.

claim_text: Five more countries are in the process of joining, including Turkey.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. The UK has a veto, but officially supports Turkey joining.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. The UK has a veto, but officially supports Turkey joining.

claim_text: There are now 28 member states of the EU, the most recent being Romania, Bulgaria and Croatia.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct, there are now 28 member states of the EU.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct, there are now 28 member states of the EU.

claim_text: All English schoolchildren are taught geography until at least the age of 14 — many until 16 — and in geography they’re taught about climate change.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. Climate change is also part of the science curriculum in England, which all children are taught up to the age of 16. Some students have recently said they’re not learning enough about climate change on the current curriculum.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. Climate change is also part of the science curriculum in England, which all children are taught up to the age of 16. Some students have recently said they’re not learning enough about climate change on the current curriculum.

claim_text: Only a handful of MPs turned up to debate a pay rise for health and social care workers.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. This debate related to a petition, and these debates are generally sparsely attended.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. This debate related to a petition, and these debates are generally sparsely attended.

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. These are the numbers of deaths registered in the UK for each year.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. These are the numbers of deaths registered in the UK for each year.

claim_text: Business rates are set to rise for more than 500 businesses from 1st April 2017.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: That’s correct, although rates are set to fall for many others.

review_rating.alternateName: That’s correct, although rates are set to fall for many others.

claim_text: There’s been a reduction in the quantity of business rates across the board in total.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: That’s correct. In the past few years a combination of increased reliefs, threshold changes and caps on business rate increases have reduced the amount businesses are paying overall.

review_rating.alternateName: That’s correct. In the past few years a combination of increased reliefs, threshold changes and caps on business rate increases have reduced the amount businesses are paying overall.

claim_text: Every week in prisons there are 600 incidents of self-harm, at least one suicide, and 350 assaults, including 90 on staff.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct, although suicides aren't measured precisely. 2015 was the worst year on record for these incidents.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct, although suicides aren't measured precisely. 2015 was the worst year on record for these incidents.

claim_text: Reversing recent cuts to Capital Gains Tax will save £2.7 billion.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct according to official estimates, although the true amount could vary a bit either way.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct according to official estimates, although the true amount could vary a bit either way.

claim_text: The EU imposes taxes or “tariffs” on rice, oranges, coffee, wine, children’s clothes and other non-EU imports.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct, though not all non-EU trade is subject to tariffs. The EU has arrangements—including trade deals—with non-EU countries that reduce or remove these tariffs.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct, though not all non-EU trade is subject to tariffs. The EU has arrangements—including trade deals—with non-EU countries that reduce or remove these tariffs.

claim_text: People pay for tariffs set by the EU every time they shop—and the government collects the money and sends it to Brussels.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. A proportion of this money is then spent in the UK on EU-funded projects, though less than most other EU countries.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. A proportion of this money is then spent in the UK on EU-funded projects, though less than most other EU countries.

claim_text: 93% of the world is not in the EU.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct, looking at the world’s population. About 78% of the world’s economic output is estimated to be outside of the EU.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct, looking at the world’s population. About 78% of the world’s economic output is estimated to be outside of the EU.

claim_text: The USA and India are keen to do trade deals with the UK.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct.

claim_text: Messages encouraging users to upgrade to WhatsApp Gold should be ignored.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. WhatsApp Gold does not exist, but there are numerous “WhatsApp Gold” scams which encourage people to download the fake app which may be harmful for their computer or mobile device.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. WhatsApp Gold does not exist, but there are numerous “WhatsApp Gold” scams which encourage people to download the fake app which may be harmful for their computer or mobile device.

claim_text: Japanese-owned companies employ 140,000 people in the UK.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is true, according to estimates from the Japanese government, although we haven’t yet been able to look into these in detail as they aren’t published in English.

review_rating.alternateName: This is true, according to estimates from the Japanese government, although we haven’t yet been able to look into these in detail as they aren’t published in English.

claim_text: Nationally, only 69.4% of contacts are now reached and asked to self-isolate.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. The latest data from NHS Test and Trace shows that of all positive cases referred to the system, 81.4% were reached. Close contacts were identified for 80.2% of those cases. Of those identified close contacts, 69.4% were reached.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. The latest data from NHS Test and Trace shows that of all positive cases referred to the system, 81.4% were reached. Close contacts were identified for 80.2% of those cases. Of those identified close contacts, 69.4% were reached.

claim_text: The IMF said the pound was overvalued before the EU referendum.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is correct. Before the EU referendum, the IMF said that the pound was overvalued in 2015.

review_rating.alternateName: This is correct. Before the EU referendum, the IMF said that the pound was overvalued in 2015.

claim_text: In the last eight years, university tuition fees have trebled.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct, they went from a maximum of £3,000 to £9,000 for students beginning higher education in England in 2011/12. They’re now at £9,250.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct, they went from a maximum of £3,000 to £9,000 for students beginning higher education in England in 2011/12. They’re now at £9,250.

claim_text: The number of Britons getting citizenship of another EU country has doubled.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct, between 2015 and 2016.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct, between 2015 and 2016.

claim_text: The number of white people arrested for terror offences outstrips any other single ethnic group.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is correct for the year to June 2018, although this is based on ethnicity as recorded by the arresting officer. The margin is small—38% were perceived to be white and 37% were thought to be Asian. 9% were recorded as black and 16% as ‘other’.

review_rating.alternateName: This is correct for the year to June 2018, although this is based on ethnicity as recorded by the arresting officer. The margin is small—38% were perceived to be white and 37% were thought to be Asian. 9% were recorded as black and 16% as ‘other’.

claim_text: Average pay has finally surpassed its pre-crisis peak.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: True, for average weekly earnings in GB, if you don’t count bonuses. Average weekly total earnings including bonuses is still below the pre-crisis peak.

review_rating.alternateName: True, for average weekly earnings in GB, if you don’t count bonuses. Average weekly total earnings including bonuses is still below the pre-crisis peak.

claim_text: The MHRA put out a tender for Artificial Intelligence (AI) to handle reports of adverse Covid-19 vaccine reactions.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is true. In November 2020 it was reported that GenPact, a professional services firm, had been awarded a £1.5m contract to build an AI tool that could process “the expected high volume” of reports of adverse reactions occurring after, though not necessarily caused by,  Covid-19 vaccination.

review_rating.alternateName: This is true. In November 2020 it was reported that GenPact, a professional services firm, had been awarded a £1.5m contract to build an AI tool that could process “the expected high volume” of reports of adverse reactions occurring after, though not necessarily caused by,  Covid-19 vaccination.

claim_text: There were 46,850 self-harm incidents in prisons in the year to March 2018, up 16%, and an average of 128 recorded a day.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct.

claim_text: Violent incidents rose to 31,025, up 16%, of which 9,003 were on staff, which is up by a quarter in the year to March 2018.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. Assaults on staff were up a quarter from around 7,160 to 9,000.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. Assaults on staff were up a quarter from around 7,160 to 9,000.

claim_text: The amount of times drugs were found in prisons across England and Wales rose by 23% in one year. 20.4% of drug tests came back as positive.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct, including tests for psychoactive substances like spice.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct, including tests for psychoactive substances like spice.

claim_text: The gender pay gap is lower than it's ever been before.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is true. The pay gap is at a record low for full-time employees and for employees overall.

review_rating.alternateName: This is true. The pay gap is at a record low for full-time employees and for employees overall.

claim_text: There are more women in the UK in work than ever before.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is true, but it's almost always true: employment grows as the population grows. The employment rate for women aged 16-64 was also at a record high.

review_rating.alternateName: This is true, but it's almost always true: employment grows as the population grows. The employment rate for women aged 16-64 was also at a record high.

claim_text: If we left the EU without an alternative trade deal in place then we’d still have a choice about whether to put tariffs on imports.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: That’s correct. In general we’d have to apply the same tariffs to all our trading partners and keep them within limits agreed at the World Trade Organisation. It would be up to other countries, not us, to choose whether to charge tariffs on our exports.

review_rating.alternateName: That’s correct. In general we’d have to apply the same tariffs to all our trading partners and keep them within limits agreed at the World Trade Organisation. It would be up to other countries, not us, to choose whether to charge tariffs on our exports.

claim_text: Campaigners on both sides of the EU referendum made false claims.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: That’s correct. Sometimes they even made false claims about the false claims made by each other.

review_rating.alternateName: That’s correct. Sometimes they even made false claims about the false claims made by each other.

claim_text: The present government has spent more on foreign aid than any previous Labour government.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is true, at least from the data that goes back to 1970. It has also spent more than any previous Conservative government in that period.

review_rating.alternateName: This is true, at least from the data that goes back to 1970. It has also spent more than any previous Conservative government in that period.

claim_text: House building starts fell by 45% under Labour, but have increased by over two thirds since the Conservatives were in government.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is correct, but also reflects the impact of the financial crisis on house building. The exact time period you look at and the measure of building can have a big impact on how the figures are interpreted.

review_rating.alternateName: This is correct, but also reflects the impact of the financial crisis on house building. The exact time period you look at and the measure of building can have a big impact on how the figures are interpreted.

claim_text: A group of 43 European countries and territories have far more people than the UK, but fewer Covid-19 deaths.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: This is correct. Although the list excludes other European countries with high death tolls, such as France, Italy, Spain and Belgium.

review_rating.alternateName: This is correct. Although the list excludes other European countries with high death tolls, such as France, Italy, Spain and Belgium.

claim_text: The country’s most senior judge has said that women shouldn’t be able to wear veils in criminal trials.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. The head of the Supreme Court said that witnesses whose evidence is being challenged should have to remove a veil covering their face.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. The head of the Supreme Court said that witnesses whose evidence is being challenged should have to remove a veil covering their face.

claim_text: Covid-19 is no longer classified as a high consequence infectious disease.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. That doesn’t mean it’s not dangerous.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. That doesn’t mean it’s not dangerous.

claim_text: There are more teachers in English schools now than in 2010.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: That’s correct, although the number of pupils has also increased. The number of primary school teachers has risen, masking a fall in the number of secondary teachers.

review_rating.alternateName: That’s correct, although the number of pupils has also increased. The number of primary school teachers has risen, masking a fall in the number of secondary teachers.

claim_text: The World Health Organisation states that there are up to 650,000 deaths per year associated with respiratory illnesses linked to seasonal flu.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct. Between 290,000 and 650,000 respiratory deaths per year globally are attributed to the flu.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct. Between 290,000 and 650,000 respiratory deaths per year globally are attributed to the flu.

claim_text: The Chilcot Inquiry cost £13 million and the Leveson Inquiry cost £5 million.
label: credible

reviews.label: credible
reviews.original_label: Correct.

review_rating.alternateName: Correct.
